name: Markus Winkelhock
status: Retired from F1.  Currently driving in GT1 World Championship
introduction: Markus Winkelhock is a former Formula One driver who drove in one race for Spyker during the 2007 Formula One Season. He is the son of Manfred Winkelhock, and the nephew of Joachim Winkelhock, both former F1 drivers.
